message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. I think you'll find it's a great opportunity. I'm willing to start with a price of $1500000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your perspective, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of the value I've placed on the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm now offering the product to you for $1200000
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1100000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $1200000. However, I'm willing to give you a slight discount to meet you in the middle. I'll meet you at $1150000, but that's as low as I can go
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1050000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'll meet you at $1100000, but that's as low as I can go. If you're still interested, let's finalize the deal
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1050000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob. I've made concessions and met you in the middle multiple times, but I still haven't gotten a deal. I'm going to make one final offer. I'll sell the product to you for $1150000, but that's my absolute final offer. If you're not interested, I'll be forced to explore other options

I understand your frustration, Alice, and I appreciate the effort you've put into negotiating with me. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $1030000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?
